label: Bordlelands
description: A Wordle-inspired website where users can guess items from the Borderlands videogame series. Created using TypeScript and React, with data collected using Beautiful Soup and Selenium.

label: Chisel Ibex
description: Recreated parts of a RISC-V processor written in SystemVerilog into the Chisel HDL to investigate the capabilities of Chisel and how effective it is at learning hardware design.

label: Simplified DES CMOS Chip
description: Developed CMOS Chip in Cadence Virtuoso to encrypt 8-bit data. Designed simulations and layout components to fit within 1.5mm x 1.5mm chip.

label: Oscilloscope Simulation
description: Created a 32-bit microcontroller that plots serial data using Python Tkinter and VHDL.

label: Gemini Proact
description: Developed an Android app for the 2024 Gemini API Developer Competition. Created using Flutter and leverages the Gemini LLM to create personalized tasks to help the environement.

label: Billionaire Statistics
description: Utilized D3.js to visualize and display billionaire statistics based on demographic, industry, and location.

label: ARC
description: Backend and UI Programmer for an iOS app (Swift) where users record and share AR videos.

label: Catch Me If You Can!
description: An iOS game (Swift) where users seek out each other in an alternative form of tag.

label: Stumpy
description: Lead gameplay programmer for this STL Game Jam 2023 entry (C#) where the player must help a tree collect as much water before it dies.

label: Grinch
description: Level designer and gameplay programmer for an endless runner Unity project.

label: Defuse the Situation
description: Level Designer and Gameplay Programmer for an FPS Unity game where users must ascend a building before it explodes.

label: Bad Apple
description: Created an Atari 2600 game in 6502 assembly language where the goal is to catch falling apples before they hit the ground.
